fr.sii.ogham.testing.extension.junit.sms.config

Class ServerConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.testing.extension.junit.sms.config.ServerConfig

  • public class ServerConfig
extends Object
    Builder to generate a SimulatorConfiguration.

    Default configuration:

    • Starts on random port
    • No delay
    • No credentials
    • Do not keep messages between tests
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

      • randomPort

        public ServerConfig randomPort()
        Start the server with a random port. The port is contained in the range [RandomPortUtils.PORT_RANGE_MIN, RandomPortUtils.PORT_RANGE_MAX].
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent chaining

      • randomPort

        public ServerConfig randomPort(int maxPort)
        Start the server with a random port. The port is contained in the range [RandomPortUtils.PORT_RANGE_MIN, maxPort].
        Parameters:
        maxPort - the maximum port value
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent chaining

      • randomPort

      • slow

        public SlowConfig slow()
        Configure the simulator to behave like a slow server.
        Returns:
        the builder to control slow delays

      • annotationConfig

        public ServerConfig annotationConfig(SmppServerConfig annotationConfig)
        Merge with configuration provided by annotation. The configuration provided by the annotation takes precedence over configuration using builder methods. The aim is to be able to provide common configuration for the test class using JUnit rules and be able to override some configuration for a particular test.
        Parameters:
        annotationConfig - the annotation configuration
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent chaining

      • keepMessages

        public ServerConfig keepMessages(boolean keep)
        If the server is restarted, it indicates if received messages in the previous session should be kept (true) or dropped (false).
        Parameters:
        keep - indicate if messages should be kept or not between sessions
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent chaining

      • build

        public SimulatorConfiguration build()
        Create the final SimulatorConfiguration that is used by the SMPP server.
        Returns:
        the simulator configuration
